This black slime is carefully culled from coffins and sarcophagi used by the undead, and is then distilled and combined with necromantic energy, creating a dangerous sludge that leeches life force as aggressively as it rots flesh.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[5d6[void]] damage and @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[void]] damage and @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[7d6[void]] damage and @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of 8th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm].
